name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Sales Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, adept in fostering client relationships and enhancing sales processes. Exceptional communication skills in both English and Italian, partnered with strong teamwork and autonomy capabilities to drive performance and collaboration. Proven ability to manage and utilize tools such as **SAP** and **MS Office** for effective sales strategies. 

Original strengths include expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** for software development, along with robust experience in frontend and backend technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I possess a solid understanding of deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. My background in building AI/ML-powered platforms supports innovative solutions that align with healthcare and financial industry standards.

experience.responsibilities:
• Demonstrated exceptional **communication** skills by effectively conveying technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders, ensuring alignment on project objectives and sales strategies.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to foster **teamwork**, contributing to successful sales presentations and client engagements.
• Leveraged **MS Office** tools for preparing compelling presentations and reports, highlighting sales performance and product features.
• Exercised autonomy by managing the sales pipeline independently, identifying potential clients and driving the sales process to closure.
• Facilitated discussions in both **Italian** and **English**, enhancing client relations and expanding market reach.
• Provided technical support during sales calls, showcasing deep understanding of products and conducting live demonstrations of software solutions.
• Acted as a liaison between engineering and sales teams, translating client feedback into actionable recommendations for product improvements.
• Trained new sales team members on product offerings and effective sales techniques, promoting knowledge-sharing and continuous improvement.
• Conducted market research and competitor analysis to inform sales strategies and identify emerging opportunities within the industry.

- Developed strong communication and teamwork skills by collaborating with cross-functional teams to create customized financial solutions that meet client needs.
- Maintained high levels of autonomy while managing multiple sales processes, demonstrating a robust understanding of sales strategies and client engagement.

- Independently managed client relationships and presented complex technical solutions in *Italian* and *English*, fostering trust and long-term partnerships with **30+** clients.
- Employed strong negotiation skills to drive sales initiatives and close deals, resulting in a **25%** increase in annual revenue.
- Delivered product demonstrations and technical support, ensuring prospective clients understand the full capabilities of the offered solutions.

Utilized **SAP** for managing sales processes and optimizing inventory workflows, ensuring efficient backend operations directly correlated with sales performance.
Demonstrated strong **communication** skills while liaising with clients, providing technical insights and support to enhance customer satisfaction and retention rates.
Fostered **teamwork** by collaborating with cross-functional teams to align technical solutions with sales strategies, contributing to a **20% increase** in overall sales metrics over **12 months**.
